mapper.select: select * from t_user where status = 1 and username = #{username} and password = #{password}
SELECT a.id, a.group_name FROM t_group a WHERE a.status = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_friend b WHERE b.status = 1 and b.user_id = #{id} AND b.group_id = a.id )
SELECT a.* FROM t_user a WHERE a.status = 1 and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_friend b WHERE b.status = 1 and b.user_id = #{user_id} AND b.group_id = #{group_id} AND b.friend_id = a.id )

SELECT a.id, a.user_id, b.name, a.content, a.p_id, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date, d.id thumb, e.id collect FROM t_content a LEFT JOIN t_user b ON a.user_id = b.id AND b.STATUS = 1 left join t_thumb d on a.id = d.content_id left join t_collect_content e on a.id = e.content_id WHERE a.STATUS = 1 AND (a.user_id = #{id} OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_friend c WHERE c.STATUS = 1 AND c.user_id = #{id} AND a.user_id = c.friend_id)) ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
select id, content_id, file_name, substring(file_path, #{id}) file_path from t_content_file where content_id = #{content_id}

SELECT a.id, a.content_id, a.user_id, b.name, b.username, a.friend_id, a.comment_text, a.create_date FROM t_comment a left join t_user b on a.friend_id = b.id and b.status = 1 WHERE a.content_id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.user_id, b.name, b.username, a.content, a.p_id, a.create_date FROM t_content a left join t_user b on a.user_id = b.id and b.status = 1 WHERE a.p_id = #{id}
